verses.text: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ
verses.translation_en: Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast?
verses.translation_zh: 难道我没有为你而开拓你的胸襟吗？

verses.translation_en: And We removed from you your burden
Which had weighed upon your back
verses.translation_zh: 即使你的背担负过重的，

verses.translation_en: And raised high for you your repute.
For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.
verses.translation_zh: 与艰难相伴的，确是容易，
与艰难相伴的，确是容易，

verses.translation_en: So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship].
And to your Lord direct [your] longing.
verses.translation_zh: 你应当勤劳，你应当向你的主恳求。
